body:
Heey resepignev here,
Well, all of you already noticed that there are many lobby secrets.
Maybe some of you already found/know some.
If you have screenshots of them post them below.
but make sure you don't say where the secret is so everyone can explore the hub by themself xD
Here are all pictures I already found.
I know that I didn't found all of them yet, but I think thats quite a high number of secrets.

Lobby Secrets

Picture Description
Have a nise day!
Tanpikus head in a secret room.
SkylarCalibrators head in a secret room.
Sign that calls you a sausage.
Slicorns secret
That's what Evo said
The Nise room in the Avicus Hotel.
A secret library in the hub.
A lovely Flower behind a wall.
Astronis room somewhere in the hub.
There is somewhere a way to get to the back of the hub.
And this way leads to this room.
All hail the cookie!
Avicore 2.0 sign.
A secret DJ room :O
The DJ booth in the secret DJ room.
The all mighty lapis cow.
The lapis cow from the map decay.
The start of the secret maze!
If you completed the maze, then this sign waits for you!.
The secret parkour somewhere in the lobby.
The secret Notch island :O
A hiding Notch.
The secret Portal Room!
A wall full of pictures!
Nothing Here.
The Dropper!
The last secret :o btw I was the first one that discovered it. Dilpickle was second xD
HEROBRINE!
Big thanks to the Creators! Especially Eric!

replies.body:
It's just sad, it's just a shame. I worked like a slave for this network for my 8 maps and a hub, and all they do is removing all the secret places I made in the hub with my heads, and putting their secrets with their heads instead, they could've at least adding my head to one secret.. wow.. good I got a credit for making the hub at least.


EDIT: Just noticed no one has even said thank you in Skype for making a hub for them..

replies.body:
lol...

Thanks, but you didn't have to c:

It's just sad how I worked and tried so hard to improve the network and make it better, and didn't even get a single thanks from one of the builders team..

I guess they are going to reply with a message instead of saying thanks like they do in almost every thread, but yeah, whatever.


EDIT: They told me before they removed my sings because they want a mature sings and professional lobby, but then they put sings like nise men and stupid and really immature stuff, not like I have problem with immature stuff, but don't just accuse to give me the less credit you can and the most for you. I really don't like complaining on this awesome network, but this is just hard. I worked soooo hard, the mapdevs could make it alone, but I did it myself and donated my own time only to make players enjoy on that, and I don't have problem with helping, but at least a little thanks maybe?

replies.body:
LOL, if resepignev did screenshot all the secrets it has, then 8 rooms I made are removed.

And the parkour at least, removed my head their too.. and the rooms I made, removed heads too, the mine, removed heads and sings too, and 5 more rooms I made are removed, oh and the notch island, sings are removed too. You took the hub, without thanking me, removing 8 rooms and sings that I made, placing yours insteads.. I really do not have problem with that, but at least leaving my one room/parkour and still saying thanks?
